00048 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00053 /*********************************************************************/
00062 void ADC_Init(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint32_t rate)
00063 {
00064         uint32_t temp, tmp;
00065 
00066         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00067         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_RATE(rate));
00068 
00069         // Turn on power and clock
00070         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAD, ENABLE);
00071 
00072         ADCx->ADCR = 0;
00073 
00074         //Enable PDN bit
00075         tmp = ADC_CR_PDN;
00076         // Set clock frequency
00077         temp = CLKPWR_GetPCLK(CLKPWR_PCLKSEL_ADC);
00078         /* The APB clock (PCLK_ADC0) is divided by (CLKDIV+1) to produce the clock for
00079          * A/D converter, which should be less than or equal to 13MHz.
00080          * A fully conversion requires 65 of these clocks.
00081          * ADC clock = PCLK_ADC0 / (CLKDIV + 1);
00082          * ADC rate = ADC clock / 65;
00083          */
00084         temp = (temp /(rate * 65)) - 1;
00085         tmp |=  ADC_CR_CLKDIV(temp);
00086 
00087         ADCx->ADCR = tmp;
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 /*********************************************************************/
00096 void ADC_DeInit(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
00097 {
00098         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00099 
00100         // Clear PDN bit
00101         ADCx->ADCR &= ~ADC_CR_PDN;
00102         // Turn on power and clock
00103         CLKPWR_ConfigPPWR (CLKPWR_PCONP_PCAD, DISABLE);
00104 }
00105

00107 /*********************************************************************/
00112 uint32_t ADC_GetData(uint32_t channel)
00113 {
00114         uint32_t adc_value;
00115 
00116         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_CHANNEL_SELECTION(channel));
00117 
00118         adc_value = *(uint32_t *)((&LPC_ADC->ADDR0) + channel);
00119         return ADC_GDR_RESULT(adc_value);
00120 }

00122 /*********************************************************************/
00137 void ADC_StartCmd(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t start_mode)
00138 {
00139         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00140         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_START_OPT(start_mode));
00141 
00142         ADCx->ADCR &= ~ADC_CR_START_MASK;
00143         ADCx->ADCR |=ADC_CR_START_MODE_SEL((uint32_t)start_mode);
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00147 /*********************************************************************/
00155 void ADC_BurstCmd(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
00156 {
00157         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00158 
00159         ADCx->ADCR &= ~ADC_CR_BURST;
00160         if (NewState){
00161                 ADCx->ADCR |= ADC_CR_BURST;
00162         }
00163 }
00164 
00165 /*********************************************************************/
00173 void ADC_PowerdownCmd(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, FunctionalState NewState)
00174 {
00175         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00176 
00177         ADCx->ADCR &= ~ADC_CR_PDN;
00178         if (NewState){
00179                 ADCx->ADCR |= ADC_CR_PDN;
00180         }
00181 }
00182 
00183 /*********************************************************************/
00191 void ADC_EdgeStartConfig(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t EdgeOption)
00192 {
00193         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00194         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_START_ON_EDGE_OPT(EdgeOption));
00195 
00196         ADCx->ADCR &= ~ADC_CR_EDGE;
00197         if (EdgeOption){
00198                 ADCx->ADCR |= ADC_CR_EDGE;
00199         }
00200 }

00202 /*********************************************************************/
00216 void ADC_IntConfig (LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, ADC_TYPE_INT_OPT IntType, FunctionalState NewState)
00217 {
00218         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00219         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_TYPE_INT_OPT(IntType));
00220 
00221         ADCx->ADINTEN &= ~ADC_INTEN_CH(IntType);
00222         if (NewState){
00223                 ADCx->ADINTEN |= ADC_INTEN_CH(IntType);
00224         }
00225 }
00226 
00227 /*********************************************************************/
00235 void ADC_ChannelCmd (LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t Channel, FunctionalState NewState)
00236 {
00237         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00238         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_CHANNEL_SELECTION(Channel));
00239 
00240         if (NewState == ENABLE) {
00241                 ADCx->ADCR |= ADC_CR_CH_SEL(Channel);
00242         } else {
00243                 ADCx->ADCR &= ~ADC_CR_CH_SEL(Channel);
00244         }
00245 }
00246 
00247 /*********************************************************************/
00253 uint16_t ADC_ChannelGetData(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t channel)
00254 {
00255         uint32_t adc_value;
00256 
00257         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00258         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_CHANNEL_SELECTION(channel));
00259 
00260         adc_value = *(uint32_t *) ((&ADCx->ADDR0) + channel);
00261         return ADC_DR_RESULT(adc_value);
00262 }

00264 /*********************************************************************/
00273 FlagStatus ADC_ChannelGetStatus(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint8_t channel, uint32_t StatusType)
00274 {
00275         uint32_t temp;
00276 
00277         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00278         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_CHANNEL_SELECTION(channel));
00279         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_DATA_STATUS(StatusType));
00280 
00281         temp =  *(uint32_t *) ((&ADCx->ADDR0) + channel);
00282         if (StatusType) {
00283                 temp &= ADC_DR_DONE_FLAG;
00284         }else{
00285                 temp &= ADC_DR_OVERRUN_FLAG;
00286         }
00287         if (temp) {
00288                 return SET;
00289         } else {
00290                 return RESET;
00291         }
00292 
00293 }
00294 
00295 /*********************************************************************/
00300 uint32_t ADC_GlobalGetData(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx)
00301 {
00302         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00303 
00304         return ((uint32_t)(ADCx->ADGDR));
00305 }
00306 
00307 /*********************************************************************/
00315 FlagStatus      ADC_GlobalGetStatus(LPC_ADC_TypeDef *ADCx, uint32_t StatusType)
00316 {
00317         uint32_t temp;
00318 
00319         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADCx(ADCx));
00320         CHECK_PARAM(PARAM_ADC_DATA_STATUS(StatusType));
00321 
00322         temp =  ADCx->ADGDR;
00323         if (StatusType){
00324                 temp &= ADC_DR_DONE_FLAG;
00325         }else{
00326                 temp &= ADC_DR_OVERRUN_FLAG;
00327         }
00328         if (temp){
00329                 return SET;
00330         }else{
00331                 return RESET;
00332         }
00333 }
